definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
Pingyu county in Zhumadian 駐馬店|驻马店[Zhu4 ma3 dian4], Henan
Pingyu county in Zhumadian 駐馬店|驻马店[Zhu4 ma3 dian4], Henan
Wang Daiyu (1584-1670), Hui Islamic scholar of the Ming-Qing transition
to build up public opinion/to create a fuss

sentences.english: Last term I took part in a geography research study group.
sentences.chinese: 上學期，我參加了地輿小組的研究性學習。

sentences.english: The photographer put the graph in the paragraph on geographicing geometry.
sentences.chinese: 攝影師將圖表插到論述地輿幾何學的段落。

sentences.english: The  rebels labeled the labor laboring in the  laboratory and  lavatory.
sentences.chinese: 反叛者給在實驗室和輿洗室勞動的勞工貼上標籤。

sentences.english: As far as Jieyu's experience is concerned, you are blind and deaf.
sentences.chinese: 在接輿的經驗層面上，你就是個瞎子，就是聾子。

sentences.english: The work of the Holy Spirit in personal experience cannot be disengaged from Scripture.
sentences.chinese: 聖靈在個人的經歷的工作是不能輿聖經分割的。

sentences.english: Every flatterer lives at the expense of those who listen to him.
sentences.chinese: 阿輿奉承的人是靠聽信讒言的人活命的。

sentences.english: He is very familiar with the geographical features of this district.
sentences.chinese: 他對這一地域的地輿特性很熟習。

sentences.english: The counselors are those who had specialized technology while were lower in social position.
sentences.chinese: “輿人”是擁有一種專門技術而社會地位低下的人。

sentences.english: StopWatch is an application that functions like a real stopwatch.
sentences.chinese: 秒錶是一個原理和功能輿真正的秒錶相同的實用程序。

definition: to go (to visit a superior)/one's current attainment in learning or art
variant of 御[yu4]/to drive/to manage/to control
outside horses of a team of 4
(history) to have an audience with the Emperor
